snippet.title: Agent A Chapter 4: A Narrow Escape - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Chapter 4: A Narrow Escape, the exhilarating new episode of Agent A: A puzzle in disguise will arrive via the Appstore and Google Play on the 7th Dec 2017.

Download chapters 1-3 now and try to catch the evil villain Ruby La Rouge before it's too late!

iOS Appstore:
http://apple.co/AgentA

Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.yakand.agentaapuzzleindisguise

If you like escape games you will love Agent A!
